body.name: Eight Saints Skincare Cloud Whip Vitamin C Face Moisturizer Day Cream, Natural and Organic Face Cream For Women, Anti Aging Cream For Face To Reduce Fine Lines and Wrinkles, 2 Ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: Your new favorite everyday Vitamin C cream for face - hydrate, brighten & block pollution. Our face cream for women is packed with maximum antioxidant protection. Cloud Whip anti-wrinkle cream blocks free radicals, fades sun spots, and prevents discoloration while locking in moisture.
Our facial moisturizer is for all skin types. This Vitamin C face moisturizer for women absorbs quickly to firm skin while offering dewy hydration.

Key natural & organic ingredients in this anti aging face moisturizer for women include Vitamin C, MSM, Vitamin B5, and Borage Oil. Cruelty free. Fragrance free. Made in USA with globally sourced ingredients.

We're all about providing truth and clarity in natural, effective skincare. In a crowded market with over-hyped “miracle ingredients”, we found most ingredients don't produce results. We drilled down to 8 key ingredients that generated the majority of the benefits for your skin: Our "Eight Saints".
Worry Free Return Policy: Try Eight Saints Vitamin C facial cream worry free with our 30 day return policy. If a product doesn't work for you, contact us and we'll happily refund you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Cloud Whip Face Moisturizer Night Shift Gel Moisturizer Up the Anti Face Moisturizer Skin Type All All All Key Benefits Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Key Ingredients Vitamin C, MSM, & Jojoba Oil Hyaluronic Acid, Peptides, & Licorice Root Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, & Peptides Scent Citrus Naturally Scented Green Tea When to Use Morning and Evening Evening Evening Item Form Cream Gel Cream Retail 33.00 36.00 34.00 Size 2 Ounces 2 Ounces 2 Ounces

Step 1: Down to Earth Gel Face Wash Step 2: Coast is Clear Face Toner Step 3: Seeking C Face Serum Step 4: All In Eye Cream Step 5: Cloud Whip Face Moisturizer How to Use Use 1-2 pumps of gel face cleanser. Add water to lather. Gently massage onto your face in an upward, circular motion. Splash with warm water to rinse. For optimal results use each morning and evening. Saturate a cotton pad and sweep over face, neck and under eyes. Alternatively, spritz 3 pumps onto palms and gently pat face for a midday refresh. After cleansing and patting dry, apply a small amount of this anti-aging serum to your entire face and neck. Let sit and allow to dry. Serum can be used daily; can be used under makeup. Lightly dab the anti-aging eye cream under and around the eye area without pulling the skin until it has fully absorbed. Apply in the morning or night after serum. Massage upwards into face and neck until absorbed. Retail 22.00 18.00 38.00 36.00 33.00 Key Benefits Cleansing Toning Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Anti-Aging Key Ingredients Vitamin C, Kaolin Clay, French Clay, & DMAE Vitamin B5, Witch Hazel, Seawater, & Kelp Vitamin C, Dandelion, Jojoba, & Vitamin E Squalane, MSM, Cocoa Butter, & Cucumber Hydrosol Vitamin C, MSM, & Jojoba Oil When to Use Morning and Evening Morning and Evening Morning or Evening Morning and Evening Morning and Evening Size 2 Ounces 6 Ounces 1 Ounce 0.5 Ounce 2 Ounces

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite for my oily skin
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer is very appropriately named- it truly does feel light as cloud. I’ve always had very oily skin that gets easily greasy and shiny with most moisturizers, so I’m veryyy selective about what I use after a lot of bad experiences. I also break out really easily and anything that feels heavy on my skin is a definite “no” for me. The super lightweight, quickly absorbing texture of cloud whip is perfect for my skin and leaves it feeling more matte than usual, yet still very hydrated (which is very important to me since I’m 32 and trying to slow down the aging process as much as possible 🥲). It has the most lovely citrusy- fresh scent that is so nice to wake up to in the morning and makes me feel really fresh and clean. I find that my makeup sits really nicely on top of this product as well, which is a huge plus because I find that usually, despite having mostly very oily skin, my makeup tends to somehow find my only tiny dry patches and cling to them horribly, giving me unwanted texture. With this, I don’t have that at all. So overall, nothing but rave reviews from me and I’ll absolutely be using this as my daily morning moisturizer for the foreseeable future. In love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Left My Skin Softer, Smoother, and Hydrated
reviews.reviewText: My first Eight Saints product was their facial cleanser and now having tried their Cloud Whip moisturizer, I am again very pleased with the quality and feel on my skin. I've been using it daily during these past holidays while visiting my family in Arizona where my skin usually gets dry. This time around my face feels so much softer, smoother, and hydrated. The cream was light and had a gentle citrus scent. It also evened out my skin tone. Best of all, I know that their ingredients are natural and clean. I look forward to trying other products they have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy In A Jar For Your Face
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Short version: well-hydrating, smoothing, soft texture. Leaves skin velvety soft. Absorbs well into skin, not heavy at all. Nice barrier from free radicals and outside elements. Seems to brighten skin. Pleasant scent. Generous size. Hydration lasts at least 24+ hours.Long version: I really do love this Cloud Whip Face Cream! First off, the jar is full, they don’t skimp on the actual amount of product in the jar.It starts as a creamy moisturizer, that seems to “melt” ever so slightly on contact with warm skin. I feel that aids in a smooth, even application. It’s just rich enough to make drier skin types feel adequately hydrated, but is not heavy at all. Melts right into the skin immediately. Doesn't sit on top of the skin, but it is not so thin that dry thirsty skin sucks it up too quickly. Emollient texture is lovely, feels like the name- if clouds were creamy and could be "whipped". In all my years, I can't recall seeing such a creamy yet fluffy, cloud-like face cream.Provides soft skin and hydration that lasts at least 24 hours. I live in a very very dry climate and have normal to dry (in the winter) skin that is definitely aging. And this cream is perfection! I have tried the brand's Daydreamer Moisturizer (which I do like but...) and this moisturizer is noticeably richer and creamier. Think whole milk versus whipping cream (regular not heavy).I feel like this moisturizer is a nice finish to my day routine because it feels like it seals in all of the other products I use so they can all work like they are supposed to- while leaving my skin well-hydrated in appearance and texture.I do feel my skin is brighter looking! I also have a couple of hyper-pigmentation spots (mild to dark) that seem to be lightening, slowly. My pores seem to look a little smaller too. And knowing that the entire product line is as close to naturally-based ingredients as possible is a huge plus! Especially for a moisturizer that will be sitting on and soaking in to the skin all day. Quick tip: Natural hydration that absorbs well also helps with smooth makeup application!The not-so-perfect things: I've always been taught that fragrance in skincare products should be a no-no. So I would like to know the source of the fragrance- if it is natural, like essential oils, etc.Finally, I would LOVE if this product had SPF in it. Considering it is formulated to aid in lightening dark spots and brighten the skin, it would be helpful to block the harmful light (from the sun mostly) a bit to aid in seeing the results better/faster. I think the company recently came out with a separate and specific SPF product. But I am in love with short routines and multi-functional products that can serve more than one single need.Overall: 4.95/5 Starts! Would absolutely recommend. Like seriously, don't hesitate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing But Not Greasy
reviews.reviewText: Cloud Whip is quite possibly my favorite Eight Saints product. This, in my opinion, is the perfect moisturizer. It is a thick and rich formulation, has great ingredients like Vitamin C, Jojoba Oil and Aloe, and absorbs quickly. It's winter here where I live, so cold wind, and hot air from car heaters are doing a number on me. Lots of moisturizers are heavy and combat dryness, but they sit greasy on the skin and absorption is poor. Cloud Whip is thick but without being heavy or greasy, and it absorbs beautifully and quickly. It is a little pricey but I find it lasts for a long time since you do not need lots.For those sensitive to scent, it comes in an unscented formula. I like the scent, its very light in my opinion and mildly citrusy, which is uplifting to mood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light yet moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: Cloud whip is my new daily moisturizer. With sensitive, eczema prone skin, it's gentle yet effective with no irritation. The scent is lovely and invigorating, fresh and citrusy. Coming out of the jar, the moisturizer is substantial, but absorbs well and doesn't leave behind any residue whatsoever. Paired with the Seeking C hyalauronic serum, it is a great regimen to kickstart the day smoothing out fine lines with a dash of aromatherapy to boot. Highly recommended!
